Class RelationList

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<E>
        • java.util.AbstractSequentialList<E>
          • java.util.LinkedList<Relation>
            • greenmirror.RelationList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<Relation>, java.util.Collection<Relation>, java.util.Deque<Relation>, java.util.List<Relation>, java.util.Queue<Relation>

    public class RelationList
extends java.util.LinkedList<Relation>
    A custom LinkedList>Relation< class providing specific filters.
    Author:
    Karim El Assal
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Parameters:
        predicate - the filter
        Returns:
        a new RelationList with the filter applied

      • removeAll

        public void removeAll()
        Removes all Relations in this RelationList. Also removes this Relation from the connected Nodes.
